alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Southeast Yuma County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Yuma and Maricopa Counties through 630 PM MST... At 529 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dateland, or 46 miles east of Fortuna Foothills, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dateland, Paloma, Tyson and Mohawk. This includes AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 45 and 79. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Southeast Yuma County
